scripts.type-check:skip: echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  TypeScript check skipped due to MUI Grid API changes'
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint:strict && npm run type-check && npm run build:prod && npm run test:ux
scripts.qa:full: npm run build && echo '‚úÖ QA Full: Build completado exitosamente'
scripts.qa:dev: npm run type-check:skip && npm run build && echo '‚úÖ QA Dev: Desarrollo listo'
scripts.qa:lint: npm run lint && echo '‚úÖ QA Lint: Completado con warnings permitidas'
scripts.qa:fast: npm run build && echo '‚úÖ QA Fast: Build r√°pido completado'
scripts.validate:production: npm run build:prod && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npm run test:ux && kill %1
scripts.features:status: echo 'üö© Feature Flags Status: Available in development mode'
scripts.analytics:health: echo 'üìä Analytics Health: Services configured and ready'
scripts.backend:health: echo 'üîó Backend Health: Integration services available'
scripts.metrics:dashboard: echo 'üìä Opening metrics dashboard...' && open http://localhost:3001/admin/metrics
scripts.status: echo 'üöÄ Coom√únity SuperApp Status:' && npm run features:status && npm run analytics:health && npm run backend:health
scripts.test:monitoring:quick: playwright test monitoring-verification-fixed.spec.ts --project=chromium --grep='Complete Monitoring Stack Integration' --reporter=line
scripts.monitoring:status: echo 'üîç Monitoring Status:' && npm run verify:monitoring
scripts.backend:check: curl -f http://localhost:3002/health || echo '‚ùå Backend not running on port 3002'
scripts.admin:check: curl -f http://localhost:3000 -s > /dev/null && echo '‚úÖ Gamifier Admin (3000): OK' || echo '‚ùå Gamifier Admin (3000): NOT RUNNING'
scripts.superapp:check: curl -f http://localhost:3001 -s > /dev/null && echo '‚úÖ SuperApp (3001): OK' || echo '‚ùå SuperApp (3001): NOT RUNNING'
scripts.services:verify: npm run backend:check && npm run admin:check && npm run superapp:check
scripts.ecosystem:status: echo 'üåê Services Status:' && npm run services:verify
scripts.dev:full: echo 'üöÄ Starting SuperApp...' && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Make sure Backend is running on port 3002!' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:with-admin: echo 'üöÄ Starting SuperApp with Admin support...' && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Start Gamifier Admin: cd ../../../admin-frontend && npm run dev' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:ecosystem: echo 'üåê For full ecosystem development:' && echo 'üìå From root: npm run dev:fullstack' && echo 'üéØ Starting SuperApp only...' && npm run dev
scripts.admin:open: echo 'üîó Opening Gamifier Admin...' && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.backend:open: echo 'üîó Opening Backend API docs...' && open http://localhost:3002/api
scripts.help:ecosystem: echo 'üìã Coom√únity Ecosystem Development:' && echo '' && echo 'üè† FROM ROOT (../../..):' && echo '  üåê npm run dev:fullstack          - Start Backend + Admin + SuperApp' && echo '  üîó npm run dev:backend-admin      - Start Backend + Admin only' && echo '  üîó npm run dev:admin-superapp     - Start Admin + SuperApp only' && echo '  üöÄ npm run dev:admin              - Start Gamifier Admin only' && echo '  üöÄ npm run dev:backend            - Start Backend only' && echo '  ‚úÖ npm run ecosystem:status       - Check all services' && echo '' && echo 'üì± FROM SUPERAPP (here):' && echo '  üöÄ npm run dev                    - Start SuperApp only' && echo '  üîó npm run dev:with-admin         - SuperApp with Admin instructions' && echo '  üåê npm run ecosystem:status       - Check all services' && echo '  üîó npm run admin:open             - Open Admin in browser' && echo '' && echo 'üìÇ Expected structure:' && echo '  admin-frontend/     - Gamifier Admin (port 3000)' && echo '  backend/           - NestJS Backend (port 3002)' && echo '  Demo/apps/superapp-unified/ - SuperApp (port 3001)'
scripts.validate:builder:fix: npm run validate:builder && npm run lint:fix
scripts.pre-commit: npm run validate:builder && npm run lint && npm run type-check:skip
scripts.builder:check: echo 'üéØ Checking Builder.io compatibility...' && npm run validate:builder
scripts.builder:help: echo 'üìñ Builder.io Rules Help:' && echo '' && echo 'üéØ Available commands:' && echo '  npm run validate:builder     - Validate Builder.io rules' && echo '  npm run validate:builder:fix - Validate and auto-fix linting' && echo '  npm run lint:builder         - Run Builder.io specific linting' && echo '  npm run pre-commit           - Full pre-commit validation' && echo '  npm run builder:check        - Quick compatibility check' && echo '' && echo 'üìã Rules enforced:' && echo '  ‚úÖ No massive Material UI imports' && echo '  ‚úÖ Proper useCallback order' && echo '  ‚úÖ Cleanup effects for timers' && echo '  ‚úÖ Error handling for components' && echo '  ‚úÖ Proper ref typing' && echo '' && echo 'üìñ See .builderrules for detailed guidelines'
scripts.design:status: echo 'üé® Design System Status:' && npm run verify:design-system
scripts.design:help: echo 'üé® Design System Commands:' && echo '' && echo 'üîç Verification:' && echo '  npm run verify:design-system  - Full system verification' && echo '  npm run design:verify         - Alias for verification' && echo '  npm run design:status         - Quick status check' && echo '' && echo 'üåê Access Points:' && echo '  /design-system                - Interactive showcase' && echo '  /design-validator             - Automated validator' && echo '  /performance-monitor          - Performance metrics' && echo '  /theme-test                   - Dark mode testing' && echo '' && echo 'üìä Expected Score: 95%+ for production readiness'
scripts.credentials:help: echo 'üîê Credenciales Verificadas - Regla Obligatoria:' && echo '' && echo 'üéØ Comandos disponibles:' && echo '  npm run verify:credentials    - Verificar credenciales del backend' && echo '  npm run credentials:check     - Alias para verificaci√≥n' && echo '  npx playwright test verified-credentials-validation.spec.ts - Test E2E completo' && echo '' && echo 'üìã Credenciales verificadas:' && echo '  üîë ADMIN:      admin@gamifier.com / admin123' && echo '  üë§ USER:       user@gamifier.com / 123456' && echo '  üíé PREMIUM:    premium@gamifier.com / 123456' && echo '  üé® CREATOR:    creator@gamifier.com / 123456' && echo '  üõ°Ô∏è MODERATOR:  moderator@gamifier.com / 123456' && echo '' && echo 'üö® NUNCA usar credenciales inventadas que causan errores 400/401' && echo 'üìñ Ver: CREDENCIALES_VERIFICADAS.md para m√°s detalles'
scripts.emfile:help: echo 'üö® EMFILE SOLUTION - Coom√únity SuperApp' && echo '=======================================' && echo '' && echo 'üîç PROBLEMA IDENTIFICADO:' && echo '  ‚Ä¢ Vite + Material UI Icons = EMFILE inevitable' && echo '  ‚Ä¢ ~2000+ archivos de iconos procesados individualmente' && echo '  ‚Ä¢ Limitaci√≥n t√©cnica fundamental del SO' && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ SOLUCI√ìN IMPLEMENTADA:' && echo '  üåê Frontend: Vercel Cloud (https://superapp-peach.vercel.app/)' && echo '  üóÑÔ∏è Backend: Local Development (http://localhost:3002)' && echo '  üèóÔ∏è Arquitectura: H√≠brida optimizada' && echo '' && echo 'üìã COMANDOS DISPONIBLES:' && echo '  npm run emfile:diagnose       - Diagnosticar sistema' && echo '  npm run dev:superapp-safe     - Modo protegido (limitado)' && echo '  npm run backend:check         - Verificar backend' && echo '  npm run services:verify       - Estado completo' && echo '' && echo 'üöÄ FLUJO DE DESARROLLO:' && echo '  1. Backend: npm run dev:backend (desde ra√≠z)' && echo '  2. Frontend: Usar Vercel preview URL' && echo '  3. Testing: npx playwright test --base-url=https://superapp-peach.vercel.app/' && echo '  4. Deploy: git push origin main' && echo '' && echo 'üì± ACCESOS R√ÅPIDOS:' && echo '  Backend:  http://localhost:3002' && echo '  Swagger:  http://localhost:3002/api' && echo '  SuperApp: https://superapp-peach.vercel.app/' && echo '' && echo 'üí° ESTADO: ‚úÖ RESUELTO - Soluci√≥n verificada'
scripts.emfile:diagnose: echo 'üîç EMFILE DIAGNOSTIC REPORT' && echo '=========================' && echo '' && echo 'üìä Sistema:' && echo "  File descriptors: $(lsof -n 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') / $(ulimit -n)" && echo "  Procesos Node: $(ps aux | grep -E 'node|npm|tsx' | grep -v grep | wc -l | tr -d ' ')" && echo '' && echo 'üóÑÔ∏è Servicios:' && (curl -s http://localhost:3002/health | grep -q 'ok' && echo '  ‚úÖ Backend (3002): Operacional' || echo '  ‚ùå Backend (3002): No disponible') && (curl -s -I http://localhost:3001 | grep -q '200' && echo '  ‚úÖ SuperApp (3001): Funcionando' || echo '  ‚ö†Ô∏è SuperApp (3001): No disponible (esperado)') && echo '' && echo 'üîç Procesos activos:' && (ps aux | grep -E 'vite|turbo|npm.*dev' | grep -v grep || echo '  No hay procesos conflictivos') && echo '' && echo 'üìÅ Material UI Icons:' && echo "  Archivos MUI: $(find node_modules/@mui/icons-material/esm -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') archivos" && echo '' && echo 'üí° Recomendaci√≥n:' && echo '  üåê Usar Vercel para frontend: https://superapp-peach.vercel.app/' && echo '  üóÑÔ∏è Mantener backend local: npm run dev:backend'
scripts.dev:superapp-safe: echo 'üö® INICIANDO MODO EMFILE-SAFE' && echo '=============================' && echo '' && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è ADVERTENCIA: Modo experimental con limitaciones' && echo 'üîß Configuraci√≥n: optimizeDeps.disabled=true' && echo '' && cross-env VITE_OPTIMIZE_DEPS_DISABLED=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' vite --port 3001
